title: Looking for some friends/people to play with
body:
Hi all!

I have been playing since early season 2 (Renekton champion spotlight is the earliest memory I have so some time before that), but took an extended break a few seasons ago (whatever season the juggernaut patch with worlds was). However, mid last year I came back and more predominately this year I have been very active playing a lot.

Unfortunately, all my friends that I used to play with have since either stopped playing or moved on to other games and I am left alone. I personally find this game a hell of a lot more enjoyable when I play with others so if there's anyone that would like to play urf/arams/normals/ranked (maybe, eventually..) or just hang out and chat about pro league or just league in general, feel free to add me and lets have a chat or play. Make sure you comment here so I know who you are.

I play jungle/support and I am very active on varying times of the day/night.

Hope you all have a great weekend!

replies.body: I'll play if you want (added you){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
